sentences.sContent: They announced their engagement in ‘The Times’.
sentences.sCn: 他们在《泰晤士报》上宣布了订婚的消息。

sentences.sContent: At the end of their meeting, it was announced that an agreement had been reached.
sentences.sCn: 会议最后宣布已达成一项协议。

remMethod.val: an(来) + nounc (讲话， 说出) + e → 讲出来 → 宣布

trans.tranOther: to officially tell people about something, especially about a plan or a decision
